programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: No. 5 Wisconsin looks to push its undefeated record to eight as it plays 2-5 Illinois at Memorial Stadium. The Badgers moved to 7-0 following their 38-13 win over Maryland in Week 8. They have held opponents to under 20 points in all but one game.
